channel.title: HpScape rs06project [Delta][317] needing devloppers
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i69.servimg.com/u/f69/18/12/63/60/coollo10.png[/img][/center] [center][size=18pt]We keep updating this topic until we get at 100%!![/size][/center]
Hey guys i started this project 1 year and 7 months ago and today, I needed some one that helps me programming some little details! My point is to make a server thats based on runescape like it was in 2006. I got a couple Source programmers but they are most of the time not avalible... This is a 317 Delta server, Programmers are Axel and Skaffa so far but i need more people to work on this project! This was a cleaned delta server, based of from Dannyscape a really crappy source but now it's almost fine! You dont need to pay for anytihing except if you want to donate for rare's or donator status, This wil be a f2p server no need to pay for a membership!
[center][u][size=18pt]Stafflist:[/size][/u][/center] [u][b]Owner:[/b][/u] Axel (Source/Client programmer & Hoster +/- 17 hours a day(only when the server gets down)) Erik (Source programmer) [u][b]Co-Owner[/b][/u] Paul Cook (Hosting 24/7) Jordi (Website programmer) [u][b]Admin:[/b][/u] SparklyTea (has apply'd for this spot) [u][b]Moderator:[/b][/u]
[center][u][size=18pt]We need:[/size][/u][/center]
- Client Side Programmer: [code] Name? Age? Skype? Dropbox? Previous work? How long have you been Programming and what did you do?[/code]
Hoster (if able VPS) [code] Name? Age? Skype? Dropbox? Info about you're computer? How long can you host the server a day?[/code]
What does our server files and client files look like ?[/size][/color][/center]
We use dropbox for our files, so this is our shared folder: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5n2549.jpg[/img]
After clicking that the Client and source folder wil popup. also the Todo list and the Read before editing! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5b9rg7.jpg[/img]
This are the source files, These where messed up... I made everything looking clean! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2urnspc.jpg[/img]
This are the client files, I am not proud of this.. It all looks messy because i am not really good at programming on the clientside. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/34pjqt2.jpg[/img]
This is the client, that is not my work but Bluurr's work. the background is my work :) (for the dutch people "you may know that place") [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5eh8qw.jpg[/img]
[center][u][size=18pt]Image's:[/size][/u][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/raszmt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zwyfph.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33mo3fk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/66ertg.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt][u]Who am i?[/u][/size][/center] I am Axel Müller i've been programming for about 3 years, My email adress is Ninjamovement@gmail.com (Just for if you want to email me.) I am 16 years old, born in Germany but i live in Belgiüm. I speak Dutch & English and a little bit French. I had a totally bad grammar but now i've changed.
[center][center][u][size=18pt]Updates:[/size][/u][/center][/center]
[b][AXEL 24.07.2012][/b] 1, Added Bob's axe store at Lumbridge. 2, Added General Store at Lumbridge. 3, Added Thessalia's Clothes Store at Varrock. 4, Added Zaff's Staves at Varrock. [b][AXEL 25.07.2012][/b] 1, Added Lowe's ranging store to Varrock. 2, Added Horvik's armour shop to Varrock. 3, Added Gypsy for the Demon Slayer Quest. 4, Added Candle Shop in Cathebry. 5, Added Edgeville general store. 6, Removed unofficial stores at Edgeville. 7, Added Larry's Team-cape Store. 8, Added Monks at Edgeville. 9, Added a Gerneral store to Cathebry. 10, Hickton's archer shop added + Fletching skillcape and hood in the shop. [b][AXEL 27.07.2012][/b] 1, Added Harry's fishing store at Caterby. [b][AXEL 08.02.2013][/b] 1, Tested: Woodcutting. ^Oak tree's arent working!^ 2, Runescape's 2006 Autodrops added (globaldrops) 3, Deleted the custom items younger then 2006 [b][AXEL 09.02.2013][/b] 1, Npcdrops.cfg is cleaned. 2, Made a client background: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lt27h5.png[/img] [b][AXEL 10.02.2013][/b] 1, Fixed 100 Source sided errors 2, Client is now 100% readdy 3, Added goblins at Lumbridge and all other npcs like cows. 4, Changed login message. 5, Created woodcutting and firemaking. [b][AXEL 14.02.2013][/b] 1, Added chat colours to the client side (@yel@@red@@or1@...) 2, Cleaned Autospawn.cfg! 3, Spell book teleports changed to original! 4, Hosting the server 17 hours a day on (hpscape.no-ip.org) [u][Hoster needed 24/7][/u] [b][AXEL 17.02.2013][/b] 1, Added drops for the npc's (1-1000) adding more later. (adding the original drops for every npc costs loads of time!) [b][AXEL 18.02.2013][/b] 1, I made a Forums for the server with Runescape design :) [b][AXEL 18.02.2013][/b] 2, Added Flynn's Mace Shop + Autospawning in Falador. 3, Added Shop keeper and assistant in Falador. 4, Added a couple missing Guards in Falador. [b][AXEL 22.05.2013][/b] 1, Added ::website and ::forums these wil open the website and forums ! [b][AXEL 23.05.2013][/b] 1, Added a anti double trade system. [b][AXEL 24.05.2013][/b] 1, Updated the commands list. [b][ERIK 24.05.2013][/b] 1, Removed all unoficial Objects in Edgeville. 2, Fixed "run orb" vv [b][ERIK 25.05.2013][/b] 1, Fixed "Wildy skull won't disappear when you leave wildy" bug 2, Fixed "Announcements" 2, the command ::commands [b][AXEL 25.05.2013][/b] 1, Added All correct fishing spots! 2, Added Drops for Dark Wizard. [b][AXEL 25.06.2013][/b] 1. Updates ::commands 2. Added a Clue Scroll system. Tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469511.msg3432778.html#msg3432778 [b][JORDI 25.06.2013][/b] 1. Website Online
[center][size=18pt][b][u]Problems getting fixed or are fixed:[/u][/b][/size][/center] Red means Not done || Blue means Busy || Green means Done 1. Much doors arent working. 2. check "2855 - 3340" out "its a city" check it for missing npc's 3. Oak tree's arent working... 4. Clean the autospawn.cfg. 5. Clean the npcdrops.cfg. 6. Add all the original NPC's to the game. 7. Add all the original shops to the game. 8. Add all the original NPC drops to the game. 9. Anti noclip for NPC's and drops. 10. Clean the client out. 11. Goto coords 3036 - 3256 with ::tele then coords and add all the original NPC's there! 12. goto coords 2944 - 3379 and add a make over mage there! 13. Make this stile work "3045 - 3305" check the nearby gates make them work... 14. check this 2 houses for any original npc's "2976 - 3316" 15. get the right npc in this house "3206 - 3397" 18. Make the door work at "3191 - 3363" and check the inside stairs and add npc's there. 19. Make the slayer tower as it is originally Coords: "3424 - 3538" 20. Add a original slayer shop to npc "1597" 21. Bat bones (530) cannot bury them, can someone make that able ? 22. Remove all unofficial object's in Edgeville. 23. Replace this client frame with the 317 old one. Example: [img]http://i.imgur.com/9Psgu.png[/img] 24. Remove clanchat. 25. goto The server files ad go into client.java and search for "public void commands() {" Make a command "::commands" for that!
[center][size=18pt][u]Skils:[/u][/size][/center]
[size=12pt][b][center][IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Hitpoints.png[/img] Hitpoints Works Fine! Not as in the real R.S. The exp rates are 1000 x more! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Attack.png[/img] Attacks Works Fine! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Strength.png[/img] Strength Works Fine! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Defence.png[/img] Defence Works Fine! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Range.png[/img] Range Works Fine! All Bows ase working so are the arrows! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Prayer.png[/img] Prayer Works Fine! All curses are working, All the bones ingame have been tested and 2 aren't working... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Magic.png[/img] Magic Works Fine! All spells have been tested, The teleports are as on the real R.S.! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Agility.png[/img] Agility Works But not how it needs to work... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Farming.png[/img] Farming is being worked on... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Fishing.png[/img] Fishing Works Fine! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Herblore.png[/img] Herlbore is Being Worked on... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Runecrafting.png[/img] Runecrafting is added but needs a lot of work! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Thieving.png[/img] Thieving Works Fine! Stalls work fine so are npc's working fine! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Woodcutting.png[/img] Woodcutting Works Fine, Except for Oak Tree's they don't give logs... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99mining.png[/img] Mining Works Fine! All ore's are working! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Cooking.png[/img] Cooking Works Fine! All raw food can get cooked! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Crafting.png[/img] Crafting needs to be tested! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Firemaking.png[/img] Firemaking Works Fine! Except for the walking one space to the side after each bonfire... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Fletching.png[/img] Fletching Works Fine! The interfaces have been added! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Slayer.png[/img] Slayer Works Fine! The slayer system has been added but the Slayer tower and all many npc are missing... [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/99Smithing.png[/img] Smithing Works Fine! Except for the interface that is misssing! [IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss141/Jacks_Designs/Old%20Work/Quest.png[/img] Quests are not done yet, like 10 Quests have been added...[/center][/b][/size]
[center][size=18pt][u]Credits:[/u][/size][/center] - Delta 70%. - Not danny anymore because he's programming was shit! - Me 8%. - Bluur 12% for the client. - Erik 10%
[center][size=18pt][u]Progress:[/u][/size][/center] 35%/100% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

item.title: HpScape rs06project [Delta][317] needing devloppers
item.dc:creator: @Ninjamovement Ninjamovement
item.description:
@Ninjamovement wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][size=18pt]We keep updating this topic until we get at 100%!![/size][/center]

Hey guys i started this project 1 year and 7 months ago and today, I needed some one that helps me programming some little details!
My point is to make a server thats based on runescape like it was in 2006.
I got a couple Source programmers but they are most of the time not avalible…
This is a 317 Delta server, Programmers are Axel and Skaffa so far but i need more people to work on this project!
This was a cleaned delta server, based of from Dannyscape a really crappy source but now it’s almost fine!
You dont need to pay for anytihing except if you want to donate for rare’s or donator status, This wil be a f2p server no need to pay for a membership!

[center][size=18pt]Stafflist:[/size][/center]
Owner:
Axel (Source/Client programmer & Hoster +/- 17 hours a day(only when the server gets down))
Erik (Source programmer)
Co-Owner
Paul Cook (Hosting 24/7)
Jordi (Website programmer)
Admin:
SparklyTea (has apply’d for this spot)
Moderator:

[center][size=18pt]We need:[/size][/center]

  • Client Side Programmer:
